Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimize a linear objective function subject to linear constraints

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Optimize a linear objective function subject to linear constraints with integer variables

Name: Mixed-Integer Linear Programming
Description: Optimize a linear objective function subject to linear constraints with both integer and continuous variables
Example: Supply chain optimization with fixed costs

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimize a nonlinear objective function subject to nonlinear constraints
Example: Optimize a chemical process with nonlinear reactions

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Optimize a quadratic objective function subject to linear constraints

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Break down complex problems into smaller subproblems and solve recursively

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Optimize convex objective functions subject to convex constraints

Name: Nonconvex Optimization
Description: Optimize nonconvex objective functions subject to nonconvex constraints
Example: Optimize a nonconvex function with multiple local minima

Name: Semidefinite Programming
Description: Optimize a linear objective function subject to linear matrix inequalities
Example: Optimize a graph with semidefinite constraints

Name: Second-Order Cone Programming
Description: Optimize a linear objective function subject to second-order cone constraints

Name: Bilevel Programming
Description: Optimize a problem with a nested optimization problem
Example: Optimize a system with a nested control problem
